blogPost.excerpt: The very first all-in-one Clubhouse management platform: The MVP version of Direcon is designed to solve the urgent problems of people who moderate rooms on Clubhouse like lack of insights about their rooms and limited moderation options.
blogPost.body: The very first all-in-one Clubhouse management platform: The MVP version of Direcon is designed to solve the urgent problems of people who moderate rooms on Clubhouse like lack of insights about their rooms and limited moderation options.
blogPost.title: Direcon for Clubhouse - All-in-one Clubhouse management platform
blogPost.author: Sush

localize.description: 第一款一体化的Clubhouse管理平台。MVP版的Direcon是为了解决在Clubhouse上管理房间的人的迫切问题 比如缺乏对房间的了解和有限的管理选择。
第一款一體化的Clubhouse管理平臺。MVP版的Direcon是爲了解決在Clubhouse上管理房間的人的迫切問題 比如缺乏對房間的瞭解和有限的管理選擇。

next.excerpt: Paragon Connect allows developers to embed user-facing SaaS integrations into their product in minutes. Setup the Paragon SDK once and instantly integrate your product with popular SaaS apps like Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack, JIRA, and more.
next.title: Paragon Connect - Build embedded, native SaaS integrations in minutes

localize.description: Paragon Connect允许开发人员在几分钟内将面向用户的SaaS集成嵌入到他们的产品中。只需设置一次Paragon SDK，就可以立即将您的产品与Salesforce、HubSpot、Slack、JIRA等流行的SaaS应用集成。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内构建嵌入式的原生SaaS集成。

localize.description: Paragon Connect允許開發人員在幾分鐘內將面向用戶的SaaS集成嵌入到他們的產品中。只需設置一次Paragon SDK，就可以立即將您的產品與Salesforce、HubSpot、Slack、JIRA等流行的SaaS應用集成。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內構建嵌入式的原生SaaS集成。
